subject: Details about this app
content:
Hi! This is a simple email app built using Angular. It functions in a manner very similar to Gmail.


You can:


· Read emails
· Delete emails
· Search email by title

The emails are stored locally as JSON files. The search capability is handled by an Angular service.
There are two views:

1. The inbox view (default view), and
2. The email view (injected once you click on an email.)

Thanks for stopping by!

Please check out my other work as well:

· Journey HTML5 Theme
· Codepen Projects
